name: dust-message-helper
description: A helper for runtime use of @pre and @message i18n tags

scripts.prepublish: webpack index.js index.amd.js --output-library-target=amd --library=dust-message-helper && webpack index.js index.umd.js --output-library-target=umd && webpack index.js index.browser.js --output-library-target=var --library=dustMessageHelper

author: Aria Stewart <ariastewart@paypal.com>
